channel.title: PI 317 pet help
channel.description:
ok, so a while back i added this tutorial to my server, http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/307510-pi-summoning-base.html (google being Ru-se) , and it worked great for pets..but theres only one problem, the pets walk so they get left behind, and they dont teleport with u, could anyone help me set up a way to say if its like 5 steps behind u, move back to 1 step behind the player? and if u teleport, make it go with u?
will rep++ for help with this, thanks in advance, l0lc0pt3r

item.title: PI 317 pet help
